commentBody: I know I am about to become immensely unpopular, but I can't help wondering what could be accomplished if the money, thought, and enthusiasm spent on football were spent on other purposes. What is so wonderful about promoting a basically animal contest? Is this what is laudable about being human? Football seems to affirm what is most base in humanity - blood and guts, warlike instincts, gambling, win/lose mentality - to name a few. To me, it seems like a legal narcotic.
